channel.title: Crystal lake survival
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wKOpK.jpg[/img] [size=14pt][b]CLSMC.DYNDNS.ORG[/b][/size] [size=12pt] Master Survival and build your empire.
30 Min. Deathban.
Griefing, Theft and Murder are allowed.
Leave the Spawn Island to get started.
[b]Other info:[/b] No world resets.
In the rare case of a reset: -Account balances and Stats are carried over. -There'll be time to bring a few personal items into the new world.
Bonus: Survive in the mall from George Romero's Dawn of the Dead! [/size] [size=12pt]http://crystallakesurvival.webs.com/[/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EicAuiROOyI[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mqliE1G7ImM[/youtube]

item.title: Crystal lake survival
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

Demon6994:

You’re not welcome about it. Because deathban is kind of stupid when you’re caught fact to face with a creeper. And BOOM! And the fact you’re probably OP and when you die, and DON’T get banned, you just keep on your marry way. So think about other people, like myself who are too dense and narrow-minded to understand that not every server can be tailored to my exact liking, and other people like other attributes that i may not.

you’re only banned for 45 minutes, so it is like in halo, where you may have the penalty of waiting before you are allowed to be re-spawned. the ban is only used as an easy tool to force you to wait the 45 minutes before you can spawn again, which, in my opinion, is fair as it is something implemented for this kind of server game-play, and if you do not like it then you can always leave, as you are not being forced to play this server.

Read full topic

item.title: Crystal lake survival
item.dc:creator: @DoctorBoyd DoctorBoyd
item.description:
@DoctorBoyd wrote:

The server is still up and running using 1.5.1.

Read full topic

item.title: Crystal lake survival
item.dc:creator: @DoctorBoyd DoctorBoyd
item.description:
@DoctorBoyd wrote:

reyx7:

War would be interesting with a death ban. Would seem like a slow, conservative battle, with maybe 1 or 2 suiciders. Still in good fun, though.

Would be interesting indeed.

Read full topic

item.title: Crystal lake survival
item.dc:creator: @DoctorBoyd DoctorBoyd
item.description:
@DoctorBoyd wrote:

Demon6994:

You’re not welcome about it. Because deathban is kind of stupid when you’re caught fact to face with a creeper. And BOOM! And the fact you’re probably OP and when you die, and DON’T get banned, you just keep on your marry way. So think about other people.

I agree that deathban isn’t for everyone.
When playing on a deathban server a person should try to avoid being caught in those situations.
The mods and I play with the same deathban penalties as everyone else. The only time it doesn’t apply to us is when tp’ing to a problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Crystal lake survival
item.dc:creator: @DoctorBoyd DoctorBoyd
item.description:
@DoctorBoyd wrote:

Demon6994:

So when you die you get banned. Niiiice. Not. >.> That’s so horrible.

I’m thinking this server isn’t for you. Hardcore survivalists appreciate the deathban.
Thanks for the bump!

Read full topic

item.title: Crystal lake survival
item.dc:creator: @DoctorBoyd DoctorBoyd
item.description:
@DoctorBoyd wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:8, topic:417421”][quote author=DoctorBoyd link=topic=519972.msg3782974#msg3782974 date=1318638205]
If someone dies they should hope to have friends to come and grab their stuff.
The deathban puts a bigger emphasis on survival my stupidity.
[/quote][/quote]

Thanks again for your opinion.
